TopicTitle: A New Rocket Scientist Noob (again due to data loss)

Articles.Content:
Well,

I'm not happy that someone decided to DdoS the server but, like anything else, if you get popularity you always have some enemies as well.

Anyways, this Thread should be about me right?

There are a lot of stories and achievements I could brag with... but to keep it short I won't. A station with an altitude of 400km around kerbin, 2 modules on the mun with more to come for my kethane Operation, a Polar orbit Probe around Mun and Minmus fitted with a GPS and Kethane Scanner.

My actual task is to build a Space Tanker that will Deliver the converted Kethane from Mun to the Tanker. That Tanker will then be fueling the Raven Station for crafts on their way to interplanetary travel if I ever need to fuel a stage.

This is my main task for now since I probably want to Visit Duna. My Second task will be a Probe with an engine. A self orbit changing Probe so to say. It'll go to Duna and one will be docked at the back of the Tanker, just incase I need one:P

Wish I could get unlocked so I edit my Signature...

Regards,

Cycrow
